docs.text: Color Picker Create a color picker with 2 components. One component should contain the slider and the label. The other component will be a div to display the color. Use prop binding and reactive variables to make your application dynamic. Code Copy const rgbToHex = function (rgb) { var hex = Number(rgb).toString(16); if (hex.length < 2) { hex = "0" + hex; } return hex; }; export const fullColorHex = function (r, g, b) { var red = rgbToHex(r); var green = rgbToHex(g); var blue = rgbToHex(b); return "#" + red + green + blue; }; Learning Goals Reactive Variables Props and prop binding Resource Discord Prop Binding Reactive Variables

docs.text: Svelte Mini Challenge - Move Pixel In this mini-challenge, your goal is to create a svelte application with four buttons, up, down, left, and right. Each time a button is clicked, it should move the pixel div in that button's direction. Go ahead and give this mini-challenge a good try and if you have any problems or feedback, let me know in the comments below. Please let me know if you did the mini-challenge and its solution. I have learned a lot from other people's challenge solutions, and it helps others. Code Demo Resources Discord on:click components
